title: Sins from my Stepmother: In Plain Sight
description: Teddy Carlson is in deep. Literally.He and his stepmom, Jill, have just spent the last two weeks screwing each other’s brains out in nearly every single room of their sprawling Greenwich home.But Teddy’s dad, David, has recently announced he’s planning to take a break from work so he can spend more time with the family. Does he suspect something? Teddy doesn’t know. But he does know that he doesn’t want to give this up. Because this kind of spectacular, earth-shattering sex, makes morphine feel like skittles. Will David find out about the carnal acts to have taken place in his own bedroom?What sort of risks are Teddy and Jill prepared to take to continue their depraved affair? And what is Teddy refusing to tell us about what else happened that summer?'In Plain Sight' is Book III in the 'Sins from my Stepmother' series.
author: C.R.R. Crawford
